lead_paragraph: Erin Thorn, who entered the game averaging 6.2 points, scored a career-high 24 to lead the Liberty to an 85-80 victory over the Sting in Charlotte last night.
snippet: Erin Thorn, who entered the game averaging 6.2 points, scored a career-high 24 to lead the Liberty to an 85-80 victory over the Sting in Charlotte last night.
